stories.original_headline: Scientists discover protein that rejuvenates aging brain cells
stories.original_summary: A newly identified protein may hold the key to rejuvenating aging brain cells. Researchers found that boosting DMTF1 can restore the ability of neural stem cells to regenerate, even when age-related damage has set in. Without it, these cells struggle to renew and support memory and learning. The fin
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Elixir to Restore Old Wits!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a remarkable new elixir. This potent draught, drawn from a newly found enchanted essence, can rekindle the spirit-weaving cells in elderly minds. It promises to restore lost wit and the ability to learn new lore, bringing renewed vigor to the aging.

stories.original_headline: Europe’s “untouched” wilderness was shaped by Neanderthals and hunter-gatherers
stories.original_summary: Long before agriculture, humans were transforming Europe’s wild landscapes. Advanced simulations show that hunting and fire use by Neanderthals and Mesolithic hunter-gatherers reshaped forests and grasslands in measurable ways. By reducing populations of giant herbivores, people indirectly altered h
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Clans Sculpted the Wilds of the Western Lands!
stories.fantasy_story: Long before the first farms, the ancient Forest Dwellers of the Western Lands shaped the untamed wilds. Through their primal practices of fire and the hunt, these clans altered forests and grasslands. By thinning herds of great beasts, they unknowingly sculpted the very landscape for generations to come.

stories.original_headline: A surprise God of War prequel is out on the PS5 right now
stories.original_summary: To close out its February 2026 State of Play presentation, Sony revealed God of War Sons of Sparta, a new prequel 2D side scroller in the God of War franchise, and announced that it's out right now on PlayStation 5. "God of War Sons of Sparta is a 2D action platformer with a canon story […]
stories.fantasy_headline: New Scrying Orb Vision Reveals Forgotten Warrior-God Tale!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Storyteller's Guild has just unveiled a startling new vision for the wondrous Scrying Orbs! A lost tale of the Warrior-God, Kratos, depicting his younger days, can now be experienced by all. This interactive scroll, a prequel to his legendary sagas, is available immediately for all with a Scrying Orb.
